Articles.Content: I was told to make an X-Wing, so I did. It\'s a bit wonky, but I can get it up in the air (for like three seconds), so you should be able to too!
Please add screen shots so we can get a idea of it instead of having to download it and see.

you have your control surfaces facing the wrong direction when you installed then. they need to be flush with the wing in order to possibly work.

EDIT: I removed a few SAS sections and changed the surfaces and it flys!! i might try the same with dual engines either side as three seem to struggle.

you have your control surfaces facing the wrong direction when you installed then. they need to be flush with the wing in order to possibly work.

Ironically, that was the only way I could get it off the ground. And it\'s like that because the Spaceplane Hanger was being difficult.
